text: Ignazio Benito Maria La Russa (born 18 July 1947) is an Italian politician who is serving as President of the Senate of the Republic since 13 October 2022. He is the first politician with a neo-fascist background to hold the position of President of the Senate. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Italian Senate Category:Politicians from Sicily
title: Ignazio La Russa
